trans-unit.source: Provides a way for ASP.NET data-bound controls, such as <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> and <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" />, to automatically bind to an ASP.NET data source control within templated content sections.
trans-unit.target: 为 ASP.NET 数据绑定控件（如 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" />）提供一种可以自动绑定到模板化内容节中的 ASP.NET 数据源控件的方式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate> interface provides a way for ASP.NET data-bound controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>, to bind to data supplied by an ASP.NET data source control, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>, when the data-bound control includes templated content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate>接口提供一种方法的 ASP.NET 数据绑定控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>，用于绑定到数据由 ASP.NET 数据源控件提供，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>，当数据绑定控件包含模板化的内容。

trans-unit.source: Page developers do not implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate> interface.
trans-unit.target: 未实现页开发人员<xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate>接口。

trans-unit.source: Developers creating custom data-bound controls might manipulate <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate> objects in implementations of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ExtractRowValues%2A> methods, but do not implement their own <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate> objects.
trans-unit.target: 创建自定义数据绑定控件的开发人员可能操作<xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate>的实现中的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ExtractRowValues%2A>方法，但不是会实现其自己<xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate>对象。

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> typically are aware of their child control trees, and can therefore bind values to them, extract values from them, and pass these values between the data-bound control and a data source control whenever data binding occurs.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>通常知道其子控件树，和可以因此绑定到它们的值、 从它们，提取值和数据绑定控件和数据源控件之间传递这些值，每次数据绑定发生时.

trans-unit.source: However, when a page developer defines templated content for a data-bound control, the child controls within the template are not visible to the parent data-bound control: the parent can render the child content (because controls effectively render themselves), but it cannot extract the values of these child controls to pass to an associated data source control's update, insert, or delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果页开发人员定义的数据绑定控件的模板化内容，在模板中的子控件不会对父数据绑定控件可见： 父级可以呈现子内容 （因为控件可以有效地呈现自身），但它不能提取要传递到关联的数据源控件的更新、 插入或删除操作这些子控件的值。

trans-unit.source: In data-binding scenarios, templated content is opaque to a parent data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 在数据绑定方案中，模板化的内容是不透明的父数据绑定控件。

trans-unit.source: The `Bind` syntax makes it possible for the data-bound control to extract the values from a control data-bound inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate> instance.
trans-unit.target: `Bind`语法使得要从控件内的数据绑定中提取值的数据绑定控件<xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate>实例。

trans-unit.source: The data binding can be one-way or two-way.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定可以是单向或双向。

trans-unit.source: (These binding directions are defined by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingDirection> enumeration.) One-way data binding is any data binding performed in an outbound direction, from data source control to data-bound control; for example, any data-reading scenario involves one-way data binding.
trans-unit.target: (由定义这些绑定指示<xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingDirection>枚举。)单向数据绑定是在出站方向，从数据绑定控件，则到数据源控件中执行的任何数据绑定例如，任何数据读取方案涉及单向数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: For one-way data binding, you can use one-way data binding syntax (`<%# Eval("fieldname") %>`) inside templated content, and do not need to use two-way ASP.NET data-binding syntax.
trans-unit.target: 对于单向数据绑定，可以使用单向数据绑定语法 (`<%# Eval("fieldname") %>`) 内模板化的内容，且不需要使用双向 ASP.NET 数据绑定语法。

trans-unit.source: Two-way data-binding describes data-binding in the inbound direction, from the data-bound control to the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 双向数据绑定描述的入站方向，从数据绑定控件绑定到数据源控件中的数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: Automatic edit, insert, and delete scenarios using ASP.NET data-bound and data source controls are two-way data-binding scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 自动编辑、 插入和删除方案使用 ASP.NET 数据绑定和数据源控件是双向数据绑定方案。

trans-unit.source: These scenarios use two-way data-binding expressions (`<%# Bind("fieldname") %>`).
trans-unit.target: 这些方案使用双向数据绑定表达式 (`<%# Bind("fieldname") %>`)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate> interface and the ASP.NET infrastructure support automatic, declarative, two-way data binding between ASP.NET data source controls and templated content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate>接口和 ASP.NET 基础结构支持 ASP.NET 数据源控件和模板化的内容之间的自动、 声明性的双向数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: For more information about ASP.NET data-binding expressions and syntax, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742) and [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a).
trans-unit.target: 有关 ASP.NET 数据绑定表达式和语法的详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)和[数据绑定表达式概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。

trans-unit.source: Templated content for data-bound controls is most often defined declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 最常以声明方式定义的数据绑定控件模板化内容。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the processes most commonly used to bind templated data to data-bound controls.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述了最常用于将模板化数据绑定到数据绑定控件的过程。

trans-unit.source: Data-bound control
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件

trans-unit.source: Process
trans-unit.target: 进程

trans-unit.source: The data-bound control is bound to data using the `DataSourceID` property of the data source control, and the templated content is defined in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ItemTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.EditItemTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.InsertItemTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件绑定到数据使用`DataSourceID`中定义的数据源控件和模板化的内容的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ItemTemplate%2A>，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.EditItemTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.InsertItemTemplate%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The data-bound control is bound to data using the `DataSourceID` property of the data source control, and the templated content is defined in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ItemTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.EditItemTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件绑定到数据使用`DataSourceID`中定义的数据源控件和模板化的内容的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.ItemTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField.EditItemTemplate%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control does not support an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件不支持插入操作。

trans-unit.source: The data-bound control is bound to data using the `DataSourceID` property, and the templated content is defined in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A> property, or in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件绑定到数据使用`DataSourceID`中定义属性和模板化的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>属性，或在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> controls do not support automatic two-way data-binding scenarios.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>控件不支持自动双向数据绑定方案。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET implicitly creates an <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate> object when templated content that binds to an ASP.NET data source control within the template is parsed.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 隐式创建<xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate>对象时分析将绑定到的模板中的 ASP.NET 数据源控件的模板化内容。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the ASP.NET parser creates an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.CompiledBindableTemplateBuilder> class when it parses templated content that uses ASP.NET data-binding syntax and contains ASP.NET Web server controls that support data binding.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，ASP.NET 分析器将创建的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.CompiledBindableTemplateBuilder>类时它会分析使用 ASP.NET 数据绑定语法，并包含支持数据绑定的 ASP.NET Web 服务器控件的模板化内容。

trans-unit.source: These ASP.NET sever controls are marked by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BindableAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 这些 ASP.NET 服务器控件标记<xref:System.ComponentModel.BindableAttribute>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate> interface defines one method, <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate.ExtractValues%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate>接口定义一个方法， <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate.ExtractValues%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method is defined for two-way data binding, so that a data-bound control can automatically extract name/value pairs from templated content and pass the pairs to a data source control at run time.
trans-unit.target: 此方法定义为双向数据绑定，以便数据绑定控件可以自动从模板化的内容中提取名称/值对，并在运行时将对传递给数据源控件。

trans-unit.source: For automatic data binding to succeed, the field names extracted from the templated content by the <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate.ExtractValues%2A> method must match parameter names in an associated data source control.
trans-unit.target: 为了成功的自动数据绑定，从通过模板化内容中提取的字段名称<xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate.ExtractValues%2A>方法必须与关联的数据源控件中的参数名称匹配。

trans-unit.source: Control developers call the <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate.ExtractValues%2A> method explicitly only within their implementations of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ExtractRowValues%2A> or some other similar method of a custom data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 控制开发人员调用<xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate.ExtractValues%2A>方法显式仅在其实现的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ExtractRowValues%2A>或通过某些其他类似的方法的自定义的数据绑定控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control can declaratively define templated content, bind to data provided by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control, and display and edit existing records.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件可以以声明方式定义模板化的内容，将绑定到提供的数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制，并显示和编辑现有记录。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET parser parses the templated content and creates an <xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate> object at run time that is able to bind values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control to the data-binding areas defined in the template by both one-way ASP.NET data-binding syntax (`<%# Eval("fieldname") %>`) and two-way data-binding syntax (`<%# Bind("fieldname") %>`).
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 分析器分析模板化的内容，并创建<xref:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate>在能够将值从绑定的运行时对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件添加到模板中定义的由两个单向的 ASP.NET 数据绑定语法的数据绑定区域 (`<%# Eval("fieldname") %>`) 和双向数据绑定语法 (`<%# Bind("fieldname") %>`)。

trans-unit.source: This control has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此控件具有一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> from which to extract name/value pairs, which are passed by the data-bound control to an associated data source control in two-way data-binding scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 在双向数据绑定方案中，数据绑定控件将 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" />（要从中提取名称/值对）传递至关联的数据源控件。

trans-unit.source: When implemented by a class, retrieves a set of name/value pairs for values bound using two-way ASP.NET data-binding syntax within the templated content.
trans-unit.target: 通过类来实现时，使用模板化内容中的双向 ASP.NET 数据绑定语法对绑定值的一组名称/值对进行检索。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> of name/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 名称/值对的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" />。

trans-unit.source: The name represents the name of a control within templated content, and the value is the current value of a property value bound using two-way ASP.NET data-binding syntax.
trans-unit.target: 名称表示模板化内容中控件的名称，值是使用双向 ASP.NET 数据绑定语法绑定的属性值的当前值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate.ExtractValues(System.Web.UI.Control)" /> method must conform to the following rules:
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate.ExtractValues(System.Web.UI.Control)" />方法必须符合以下规则：

trans-unit.source: If more than one binding exists for a given field, the last binding encountered is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果为给定字段中存在多个绑定，则使用遇到的最后一个绑定。

trans-unit.source: In order to reference a control's identifier in the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate.ExtractValues(System.Web.UI.Control)" /> method, the control must also have a user-defined ID property at parse time.
trans-unit.target: 若要引用中的控件的标识符<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate.ExtractValues(System.Web.UI.Control)" />方法，该控件还必须具有用户定义的 ID 属性在分析时。

trans-unit.source: If no ID exists, this results in a parse error.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在 ID，这会导致分析错误。

trans-unit.source: Two-way ASP.NET data-binding syntax is only valid in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> or <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate" /> property of a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 双向 ASP.NET 数据绑定语法才有效中<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />或<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate" />数据绑定控件的属性。
